name: Howl of the West - OSR Supplement
name_original: Howl of the West - OSR Supplement
description:
Howl of the West

The Cursed Lands lure many to their graves. By sail they come for blood and glory!

  • Grim-dark OSR supplement for Age of Moloch.
  • Modular and ready to drop into any game.
  • Written with a belly full of mead.
